Recommendations: 1. All extension activities should be properly planned, following the guidelines stated in the Manual of Operations for Extension.
2. Full implementation of extension program must be sustained and conducted over a certain period of time to achieve the desired effects.
3. A system of monitoring the extension activities must be devised to suit the needs of the program.
4. There must be a regular evaluation of the extension activities and all the persons involved in the program.
5. All extension activities should be documented, from the panning stage to the publication of the entire program, showcasing the results of the transfer of technology to the target clientele.
6. Documents exhibited for accreditation should be limited to those that are pertinent to the area evaluated
